--- Testing vfmadd231pd (Fused Multiply-Add of Packed Double-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---

[128-bit test]
Input a: 1.000000 2.000000 
Input b: 5.000000 6.000000 
Input c: 0.100000 0.200000 
Result: 5.100000 12.200000 
Expected: 5.100000 12.200000 

[256-bit test]
Input a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
Input b: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
Input c: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result: 5.100000 12.200000 21.300000 32.400000 
Expected: 5.100000 12.200000 21.300000 32.400000 

[Special values test]
Special a: 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x0000000000000000 
Special b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special result: 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 

[Rounding modes test]
Rounding mode 0:
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 
Rounding mode 1:
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 
Rounding mode 2:
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 
Rounding mode 3:
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000
